p: In the Chinese Pharmacopoeia, TLC and microscopic observation are mainly used for qualitative identification and determination of content by HPLC, and gingerol detection is mainly used to evaluate the quality of ZRR. 6-Ginerol, 8-gingerol, and 10-gingerol are chosen as three marker components to control the quality of ZRR, and it is required that the content of these marker components should be no less than the content specified in the method. ZRR and its processed products are often used in clinical practice.
